plot: Tommy, in the throes of a confidence crisis, dons a panda suit that wins him back his mojo, but may lose him his wife.
title: A Plush Life
plot_es: Tommy, in the throes of a confidence crisis, dons a panda suit that wins him back his mojo, but may lose him his wife.
plot_en: Tommy, in the throes of a confidence crisis, dons a panda suit that wins him back his mojo, but may lose him his wife.
